articles.title: Starbucks ends its ‘open-door’ policies - CNN
articles.description: Starbucks doesn’t want to be America’s public bathroom anymore.
articles.content:
Starbucks doesnt want to be Americas public bathroom anymore.
Starbucks is scrapping a policy that had let anyone hang out at its cafes or use the restrooms without making a purchase. The new rules … [+2977 chars]

articles.title: In Photos: Mars Devoured By ‘Wolf Moon’ In Stunning Sight For U.S. Sky-Watchers - Forbes
articles.description: January’s full moon, the “Wolf Moon,” rose alongside Mars at its brightest, occulting it for a short period as seen from North America. Here are the best images.
articles.content: The first full moon of the 2025 called 'Wolf Moon' that seen next to Mars rises over the sky during ... [+] a lunar occultation of Mars in Charlotte, United States on January 13, 2025. The next favor… [+3835 chars]

articles.title: United States Dementia Cases Estimated to Double by 2060 - NYU Langone Health
articles.description: An NYU Langone study shows that the risk of Americans developing dementia anytime after age 55 is 42 percent, more than double the risk reported by older studies.
articles.content:
A new study shows that the risk of developing dementia at any time after age 55 among Americans is 42 percent, more than double the risk reported by older studies.
That dementia risk translates into… [+5802 chars]
